articles.title: Turner Prize 2020 axed and replaced by £100k fund for struggling artists - BBC News
articles.description: The often controversial prize is replaced by bursaries worth £100,000 to help struggling artists.
articles.content:
Image copyrightGetty ImagesImage caption
 Oscar Murillo's papier mache people were nominated for last year's prize
